Detailed Description

Interface class that need to be implemented by user application.

Please see the following example for simple usage of TextWidget.

First you need write a class that public derived from Widget or some other UI component This class still should implement IVolumePanelUI interface. For example: 

 class MyVolumePanel : public IVolumePanelUI {
   public:
     virtual void init(gaia::core::Context* sysContext, gaia::core::Context* resContext) {
         mSysContext = new Context(*sysContext);
         mResContext = new Context(*resContext);
         mMyVolumePanelWidget = new MyVolumePanelWidget(...);
         ...
     }
 virtual gaia::core::Widget* getWidget() const {
         return getWidget();
     }
     virtual gaia::service::IVolumePanelUI* getIVolumePanelUI() const {
         return static_cast<IVolumePanelUI*>(mVolumePanelUI);
     }
   private:
     Context* mSysContext;
     Context* mResContext;
 }
